message:
SYSTEM: GeneralOntologies-v3_%28mariano%29.pdf: Página 64
Based on Mariano Fernández-López, Asunción Gómez-Pérez and Mª Carmen Suárez Figuereoa’s work
MULTI-FCA ANALYSIS. CONTENT FEATURES
Possible values for axioms: yes = [1] or no = 0.
Possible values for definitions: heavy = [1, 2], light = [1] or no = 0.
We only know how to transform the values by hand. Therefore, the best option seems to be to omit the 
version with values yes, no, etc. and directly write the version with values [1], 0, etc.
speaker: SYSTEM
